title: Common Dependencies in Electron Apps
description:
The most-used npm package dependencies in all the public GitHub repos that
depend on `electron` or `electron-prebuilt`.
Forks are excluded from this analysis.

packages.name: react
packages.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

packages.name: react-dom
packages.description: React package for working with the DOM.

packages.name: jquery
packages.description: JavaScript library for DOM operations

packages.name: redux
packages.description: Predictable state container for JavaScript apps

packages.name: lodash
packages.description: Lodash modular utilities.

packages.name: electron-debug
packages.description: Adds useful debug features to your Electron app

packages.name: react-redux
packages.description: Official React bindings for Redux

packages.name: react-router
packages.description: A complete routing library for React

packages.name: font-awesome
packages.description: The iconic font and CSS framework

packages.name: redux-thunk
packages.description: Thunk middleware for Redux.

packages.name: bootstrap
packages.description: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

packages.name: request
packages.description: Simplified HTTP request client.

packages.description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework

packages.description: Reactive Extensions for modern JavaScript
